function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Implementation dependency on a specific software package matlab","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of algorithm not performing optimally in different environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential security risks associated with the use of specific algorithms and methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity in optimization problem formulation and implementation details","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of physical distancing requirements in room layout","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in the visualization of the obtained solution","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Algorithm 1 based on randomly placing circles in a rectangular domain","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Optimization problem for arranging chairs in a rectangular room","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Iterative solving of equations can lead to algorithmic errors and incorrect solutions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trust region approximation may introduce inaccuracies in function behavior estimation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overlap of circles due to inadequate distance constraints","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective optimization of circle placement within the unit square","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of boundary constraints leading to improper circle placement","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overlap of circles leading to potential disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow and ventilation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accessibility for movement and flow of people","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overlap of circles in the two-dimensional space, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing parameters in physical spaces.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of the built environment’s impact on disease transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for disease transmission in crowded spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex mathematical modeling without real-world validation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for computational efficiency in design methodology","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airflow
